Question: Vizio CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Vizio

Vizio P-Series Quantum X

- 85-inch 4K TV
- High brightness and strong color
- Full array local dimming
- HDMI ports with latest spec
- Priced at $3,299.99

Vizio V-Series (2021 Model)

- Affordable 4K smart TV
- Trio of HDMI 2.1 ports
- Support for variable refresh rates (VRR) and voice control
- Dolby Vision and HDR10 Plus support
- Most screen sizes selling for under $500

Vizio M-Series Quantum X

- Quantum dots with full array local dimming
- 120Hz native refresh rate
- HDMI port supporting 4K at 120Hz
- Solid gaming TV for PS5 and Xbox Series X
- Prices range from $400 to $1,400

Vizio TVs Range

- D-Series: Under $300
- V-Series: Between $300 and $900
- M-Series: Between $400 and $1,400
- P-Series: Ranging from $1,399 up to $2,999
- Vizio OLED TV: 55-inch and 65-inch models, selling for $1,299 and $1,999 respectively

Vizio SmartCast

- Expanded app selection
- Built-in Chromecast and support for Apple AirPlay 2
- Free movies and TV options
- WatchFree Plus package
- Easy access to a wide selection of apps

Vizio TV Selection

- P-Series: Premium sets with QLED displays, up to 210 discrete dimming zones, HDMI 2.1 support, and gaming enhancements
- M-Series: Quantum dot displays with local dimming
- V-Series: Budget-friendly with features like ALLM and VRR
- D-Series: Small and inexpensive, suitable for secondary TVs
Summary_cn:
Vizio

Vizio P-Series Quantum X

- 85英寸4K电视
- 高亮度和强烈色彩
- 完整阵列局部调光
- 具备最新规格的HDMI端口
- 售价为3,299.99美元

Vizio V-Series（2021年款）

- 经济实惠的4K智能电视
- 三个HDMI 2.1端口
- 支持可变刷新率（VRR）和语音控制
- 支持Dolby Vision和HDR10 Plus
- 大多数屏幕尺寸售价低于500美元

Vizio M-Series Quantum X

- 使用量子点技术及完整阵列局部调光
- 120Hz原生刷新率
- 支持4K 120Hz的HDMI端口
- 适用于PS5和Xbox Series X的优秀游戏电视
- 售价范围从400美元到1,400美元不等

Vizio电视系列

- D系列：低于300美元
- V系列：300美元到900美元之间
- M系列：400美元到1,400美元之间
- P系列：1,399美元到2,999美元不等
- Vizio OLED电视：55英寸和65英寸型号，售价分别为1,299美元和1,999美元

Vizio SmartCast

- 扩展的应用选择
- 内置Chromecast和支持Apple AirPlay 2
- 免费电影和电视节目选项
- WatchFree Plus套餐
- 轻松访问各种应用选择

Vizio电视选择

- P系列：高端电视，配备QLED显示屏，最高达210个独立调光区域，支持HDMI 2.1以及游戏增强功能
- M系列：采用量子点显示屏配备局部调光功能
- V系列：价格经济实惠，具备ALLM和VRR等功能
- D系列：小巧廉价，适合用作副电视
